title: Wild goats invade deserted Welsh town as residents go into lockdown
description: With people isolating themselves at home due to coronavirus restrictions, cities around the world are falling silent. But a town in Wales has had cheeky new residents move in.
content:
Posted April 01, 2020 17:47:42 While the humans are away, the goats will play. Or at least they are in this Welsh town. Key points:
  • A herd of Kashmiri goats have been roaming the Welsh coastal town of Llandudno
  • The goats have spent the pa… [+2360 chars]
